_description: William Dunbar, A Remonstrance to the King — 88 lines in couplets

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Schir ȝe haue mony seruitourisAnd officiaris of dyuers
                    curis…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Gif þat the tryackill cum nocht tytTo swage the swalme
                    of my dispyt
